class year_month_weekday;

The class {{tt|year_month_weekday}} represents the n{{sup|th}} weekday of a specific year and month. It is a field-based time point, with a resolution of {{lc|std::chrono::days}}. {{lc|std::chrono::years}}- and {{lc|std::chrono::months}}-oriented arithmetic are supported directly. An implicit conversion to and from {{lc|std::chrono::sys_days}} allows {{lc|std::chrono::days}}-oriented arithmetic to be performed efficiently.

{{tt|year_month_weekday}} is a {{named req|TriviallyCopyable}} {{named req|StandardLayoutType}}.
